text: Cereeae are a tribe of cactus belonging to the Cactoideae subfamily. ==Genera== *Arrojadoa *Brasilicereus *Cereus *Cipocereus *Coleocephalocereus *Melocactus *Micranthocereus *Pilosocereus *Praecereus *Stephanocereus *Uebelmannia ==References== Soffiatti, P.; Angyalossy, V. Anatomy of Brazilian Cereeae (subfamily Cactoideae, Cactaceae): Arrojadoa Britton & Rose, Stephanocereus A. Berger and Brasilicereus Backeberg. Acta Botanica Brasilica, v. 21, n. 4, 2007. Category:Cactoideae Category:Caryophyllales tribes
title: Cereeae
